name: WAlert
0:
”Alexa open walert”
”Set home buzzer on”
”Set home buzzer off”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: walert
des:
The WAlert is a home Wi-Fi security device based on the subsonic frequency sensing technology. It can detect a hinged window/door open and glass break without the installation of any additional fixed sensors. Upon detection of an intrusion, a buzzer is triggered to deter the intruder, and a notification is sent to user’s smartphones over Internet.
The WAlert skill provides users a voice command capability via an existing Echo device to control the setting of the WAlert device. The WAlert skill is used to control the WAlert device as follows:

1. Set on/off home alarm
2. Set on/off home schedule
3. Set on/off home buzzer
4. Set home buzzer time options from 15, 30, 45, 60 seconds
5. Set on/off home email notification
6. Users need to log in the Walert account as follows:
 1. Open Your Skills
 2. Select Walert skill
 3.Touch ENABLE bar
 4. Login page will pop up to complete the required account 
 linking process
 5 Enter user name of your Walert account
 6. Enter password of your Walert account
 7. Touch LOG IN bar
 
Hardware requirements:
1. WAlert device 
2. iPhone or Android Smartphone
3. Echo device
